trustfund:
TF026215-FINANCING OF AUSAID SECONDMENTS,TF036231-INDIA - NATIONAL HIGHWAYS,TF036177-INDIA - A STUDY OF MANAGEMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objective of the
            States' Road Infrastructure Development Technical
            Assistance Project is to strengthen policy based efforts by
            individual States towards effective reforms in the
            provision, financing and maintenance of road infrastructure,
            while assisting their preparation of high-priority quality
            road infrastructure investments aimed at Bank financing. The
            project will, over five years, finance technical assistance
            activities in three project components: a) project
            preparation and implementation support; b) policy support
            and institutional development; and c) project management.
